ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT: Subscription Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll sign it :) if you can get them to make em bigger than 8 foot ;) And I distinctly remember something about adding speech, motorised parts to make them move
ygData.messageBody:
I'll sign it :)

if you can get them to make em bigger than 8 foot ;)

And I distinctly remember something about adding speech, motorised parts to
make them move and a remote control for them too, talk about a MEGA TOY
NERF. Think of the fun we're missing out on, "You humans have ruined your
lands, you'll not ruin mine", "Watch out orc pawn to zone"


-----Original Message-----
From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:elijah@...]
Sent: 25 April 2000 17:05
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Subscription Problems



>Would cost be an issue if it meant you could place a treeant outside your
>neighbor's bedroom window on dark & stormy night?


Exactly, I am starting a petition to un-nerf the toys. We NEED full scale EQ
toys, if we don't get them I am going to quit to go play AC and so will
everyone else and Verant will go out of business.


Tszaaz E'Taurguin, 27, Povar
